string.name: about
string.b: The FarmBuddy app is aimed to help farmers across the globe to plan out their crop cycle, with the best possible crop. Our strong machine learning analysis, analyzes your soil condition and suggests you the crop that would not need any external chemical support for growth. Thus taking care of the environment as well as cutting down on expenditures. Farmbuddy Bot in addition is to FarmBuddy App is a complete package for all the smart farmers!
